casebody.data:
Kenneth L. BERAN and James William Aubel, Coexecutors of the Estate of Joanna Lea Aubel-Johnson (formerly known as Joanna Lea Aubel), Appellants,
v.
James Tobin JOHNSON, Susan Renee Ross (aka Susan Renee Mollohan Ross), and Robert Joel Mollohan, Appellees. No. 118,126 Court of Appeals of Kansas. Opinion filed June 29, 2018.

Affirmed.
